thread.title: BRIEF-Solteq's Asset & Service Business Management segment renamed

title: BRIEF-Solteq's Asset & Service Business Management segment renamed
text:
BRIEF-Solteq's Asset & Service Business Management segment renamed 
Oct 14 Solteq Plc : 
* Asset & Service Business Management segment, which was incorporated in early 2015, will continue operations under a new name: MainIoT Software Oy 
Source text for Eikon: 
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom) Trending On Reuters
